ticket.title: missing setter for ActiveRecord::SessionStore::Session
ticket.original-body:
Hi, there are no ability to set external database as session store.
@@@ ruby MyCoolApp::Application.config.session_store :active_record_store
ActiveRecord::SessionStore::Session.connection = ActiveRecord::Base.establish_connection("sessions_#{Rails.env}") @@@
